body.warning: Apache Lenya 2.0 is still under development and should not be used for production yet. A code freeze has been announced, and the release should be imminent.
body.note: Since 2.0 is new and provides many enhancements and new features, please help to document them with us. Send documentation patches and use the Wiki. Thanks in advance :)
body.p: More documentation (work in progress) can be found at the Apache Lenya Wiki. Please treat the Wiki with care for now, as much of the information there is outdated.

dl.dd: The monolithic architecture has been replaced by a small generic core and various modules for specific purposes.
The refactored and extended repository API and new protocols make it easier to access and manipulate documents.
Documents are now identified and referenced using UUIDs. Static link rewriting is not necessary anymore.
It is now possible to explicitly deny permissions on specific pages.
It is now possible to declare custom sets of meta data.
Publication templating allows to re-use common functionality in multiple publications.
The usecase framework simplifies the implementation of user interaction functionality.
It is now easier to trigger notification messages. Each user has a personal inbox to read and send messages.
